text.desc: Leg and foot registers, center column
text.al: Htp di nsw.t wsir pr.t xrw t Hnq.t xA.(w) Apd.(w) Aw.t (n) Hsw.(t) xnw (imn) imn-ir-di=s
text.tr: An offering given by the king (to) Osiris, that he may give an invocation offering of bread, beer, fowl, meat, and offerings (to) the Singer of the Interior (of Amun), Amenirdis.
